title: The Heart of a nation
brief_description: A film record of the 1953 Welsh Eisteddford featuring the ceremonial and some of the typical international song and dance events that take place at this famous annual festival. In this instance the festival was held at Aberystwyth on the shores of Cardigan Bay.
